text:
These are absolutely wonderful.
Thank you so much!

We also hope to do our best
so that all the idols can shine.

──It's an honor. I'm really happy to be
able to stand on stage in such costumes.

Hehe, we're looking forward to seeing
your wonderful stage, Natsuha.
You're even more motivated now, Natsuha!

Yes, I have to elevate myself even more
to match these costumes.

That's right, I need to increase my self-training time!
Producer, can you adjust my schedule?
